ygData.subject: Re: Buying and Selling Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: The Lisera lute that I had was asterisked.  Oh and if you re retrieving another one from a friend s corpse *both* of them will disappear.  At least that s what
ygData.messageBody:
The Lisera lute that I had was asterisked. Oh and if you're retrieving
another one from a friend's corpse *both* of them will disappear. At least
that's what happened to me. Did finally get it to its destination after
Cassius entrusted me with another one.

Kendrin

According to the illustrious Kyle...
:)From: "Kyle" <ksibbald@...>
:)
:) Well that's odd. LiseraLute is a lore item that is not asterisked and I
:)cannot drop or trade that. Could it be that things are... *gasp*
:)inconsistent?
:)
:) Good Journey,
:)
:) Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
